Articles.Content:
EDIT: the below post was originally in last weeks Devnote thread, so thats why it might not make the most sense at first.

This is more than a bit off topic, but I am posting it anyway because I found it funny. From the main page, the link to this thread is partially cut off, so all it says is "Devnote Tuesday: Forums, l..."

This reminded me of the "Handsome face/ Anon, I..." meme, and I laughed when I saw it. It came from a very strangely animated scene of a Superman cartoon, and the edited template can be used for any character, and usually is posted with the text "_____, I..." the blank being a reference to that character in some way.

Gallery here: http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/handsome-face/photos

So the l in letters looked like an I, and not an L, and thusly "Forums, I..." was very funny to me.

Thank you for your time.

Edited December 8, 2015 by r4pt0r
A post deserving of its own thread, elsewhere...

Just now, sal_vager said:

A post deserving of its own thread, elsewhere...

Too kind, it might get seen more now, especially since soon everyone will be reading the new devnotes and not last weeks. Thanks.
I saw the forums, I thing too!  I also want to point out that capital i and lowercase l look exactly the same: lIlIlIlI
